Cabeza africana realizada en bronce por el maestro escultor Souleymane Traore, de Burkina Fasso, West Africa. To carry out this head has been used the technique of lost-wax, what makes it unique to break the mold in their manufacture.
The artists uses the method of “lost wax” from Burkina Faso to create each wax statues one by one. Each statue is a new creation, and each has its own mold.
This Angel is a smaller version of the unique lost wax piece. We wanted to make an accessible and more affordable version of the original as part of this project.
